title: Got Leaver Busted Because I Couldn't Reconnet
body:
I'm not complaining about it, but how do I make sure everything is fine before I try again?

Keep in mind, I have the computer skills of a 5 year old, so layman's terms if you can. I have a Windows Vista, Inspiron 530.

replies.body: Can you let me know what happened prior to you not being able to connect to the match? With some more details, I can provide you with a set of steps to resolve this.
I was trying to load into a match. I had some websites up and I was alt-tabbed into them.

*Alt+Tabbing* prior to seeing the *champion portraits* load up will often cause crashes or freezes. Try loading into a custom match *without* leaving the League application to see if anything changes.

Let me know if you still encounter this issue.
That, is something I should've known for years. I haven't had a crash yet so it was probably due to that. Now I know.
